root: ^Behold! A vision of a true bride!
^the mother exclaimed, her voice carrying a hint of sorrow.
^It grieves you more than it gladdens, does it not?

c-0: ^I am beginning to realize how much my son never got to do in this life,
^she said in a melancholic tone, as if lost in thought.

Ending: ^she said, sounding like she was coming out of a daze,
^I reckon it's about time you got the church ready for the Black Wedding.
